SELECT c.id, c.app_id as appId, c.app_model_config_id as appModelConfigId, c.model_provider as modelProvider, c.override_model_configs as overrideModelConfigs, c.model_id as modelId, c.mode, c.name, c.summary, c.inputs, c.introduction, c.system_instruction as systemInstruction, c.system_instruction_tokens as systemInstructionTokens, c.status, c.from_source as fromSource, c.from_end_user_id as fromEndUserId, c.from_account_id as fromAccountId, c.read_at as readAt, c.read_account_id as readAccountId, c.created_at as createdAt, c.updated_at as updatedAt, c.is_deleted as isDeleted, c.invoke_from as invokeFrom, (SELECT count(1) FROM messages m WHERE m.conversation_id = c.id) as dialogueCount, e.session_id as fromEndUserSessionId, c.inputs->>'company' as systemName FROM public.conversations c LEFT JOIN public.end_users e ON c.from_end_user_id = e.id
AND c.app_id = #{appId}::uuid
AND c.created_at >= #{start}
AND c.created_at <= #{end}
AND c.annotated = #{annotationStatus == 'annotated'}
AND c.inputs->>'company' LIKE CONCAT('%', #{systemName}, '%')
AND c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{dialogTitle}, '%')
AND c.is_deleted = false
ORDER BY c.${sortBy.substring(1)} DESC
ORDER BY c.${sortBy} ASC
ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
